sections.heading: (UTC 101) Code, how cited.(UTC 101) Sections 30-3801 to 30-38,115 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Uniform Trust Code
sections.text: SourceLaws 2003, LB 130, ยง 1;Laws 2024, LB1074, ยง 74.AnnotationsThe Nebraska Uniform Trust Code statutes are derived from the Restatement (Third) of Trusts. In re Will
